artifact.shackles.lore.0: Reduces movement speed and damage dealt by %s (max. 90 percent)

artifact.taser.lore.0: When dealing damage, there is a %s chance to create a lightning bolt that strikes %s of enemies, dealing %s of damage
artifact.taser.lore.1: Cannot trigger more than once every 0.5 seconds
artifact.boxing_glove.name: Boxing glove
artifact.boxing_glove.lore.0: Throws an enemy and stuns him for %s seconds (does not work on abilities)
